propertyGroups.name: Options
propertyGroups.description: Changing these settings will only be captured by new started jobs.

configProperties.name: mem
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: This is the hard memory limit for the docker container. It is recommended that this limit be roughly 200MB larger than the heap size of the application running inside the container.

configProperties.name: cpus
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: CPU time slice as a decimal number e.g. 0.5 to represent process priority hint.

configProperties.name: taskId
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: The UUID of the workflow task to run

configProperties.name: driverHeapLimit
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: How much memory to allow the driver to use in java heap.

configProperties.name: executorHeapLimit
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: How much memory to allow the executor jvms to use in java heap on each node.

configProperties.name: driver_debug_port
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: The port to use for debugging the job driver. Only used if debug is set to true in cluster.config

configProperties.name: executor_debug_port
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: The port to use for debugging the job executor. Only used if debug is set to true in cluster.config

configProperties.name: ui_port
configProperties.userVisibleDescription: The default port used for the spark UI. Spark will automatically pick another port if this one is in use.

volumeInfo.description: The volume where logs are stored. (note: only bind mounts are supported for customization)
volumeInfo.name: log

volumeInfo.description: The volume where data is stored. (note: only bind mounts are supported for customization)
volumeInfo.name: data
